RPY_DYFLOW.LINE: LOOP AT ta_pgrps INTO wa_pgrps WITH CONTROL tc_pgrps.
LOOP AT ta_new_pgrps INTO wa_new_pgrps WITH CONTROL tc_pgrps_new.
LOOP AT ta_cpy_pgrps INTO wa_cpy_pgrps WITH CONTROL tc_pgrps_cpy.
LOOP AT ta_err_pgrps INTO wa_err_pgrps WITH CONTROL tc_pgrps_nerr.
